License and development
-----------------------

Extended Autocomplete is hosted on GitHub:
`<https://github.com/dbaty/deform_ext_autocomplete>`_. Feel free to
report bugs and contribute there. Continuous integration is setup on
`Travis CI <http://travis-ci.org>`_: |travis-ci-status|_

.. |travis-ci-status| image:: https://secure.travis-ci.org/dbaty/deform_ext_autocomplete.png?branch=master

.. _travis-ci-status: http://travis-ci.org/#!/dbaty/deform_ext_autocomplete

Extended Autocomplete is written by Damien Baty and is licensed under
the 3-clause BSD license, a copy of which is included in the source
and reproduced below:

.. include:: ../LICENSE.txt
